title: Gorgeous Studio with Full Kitchen, Private Balcony!  Great Location!
posting_body: 246 Ritch is the perfect combination of design and functionality.
Every square foot is thoughtfully constructed with detail.
Boasting floor to ceiling windows, radiant floor heating, white washed oak hardwood floors, designer kitchen with Grohe fixtures, and private storage included with every unit.
Perfectly located right across from South Park in the heart of SoMa/South Beach.
With the Cal-Train located just 3 blocks away and every major highway within minutes, 246 Ritch couldn't be more convenient.
South Beach was once an industrial shipping area full of warehouses and docks, but has evolved into one of San Francisco’s most popular neighborhoods for both entertainment and living.
This hip, upscale neighborhood is home to dozens of epicurean options, small boutiques and luxury storefronts, entertainment options, and nightlife.
Like many other transformed San Francisco neighborhoods, South Beach has emerged as a leader and as a destination.
The neighborhood is filled with some of the city’s most renowned restaurants, bars, and nightclubs that attract people from around the Bay Area.

Homes in South Beach come in a variety of property styles including a large amount of condominiums and lofts, with an interesting mix of trendy new loft/condo developments and historic loft conversions
